name: Nature Beauty
description: A serene landscape showcasing the beauty of nature with lush greenery and a clear blue sky.

name: Urban Architecture
description: A modern cityscape highlighting the architectural marvels of skyscrapers and urban infrastructure.

name: Coastal Serenity
description: A tranquil scene by the coast featuring golden sandy beaches, calm ocean waves, and a beautiful sunset.

name: Mountain Majesty
description: Majestic mountains covered with snow, surrounded by pine forests under a clear sky.

name: City Lights
description: A night view of a city skyline with illuminated buildings and colorful lights reflecting in the water.

name: Floral Elegance
description: Close-up of vibrant flowers in full bloom, showcasing nature's beauty in intricate details.

name: Desert Oasis
description: Scenic view of a desert oasis with palm trees, sand dunes, and a clear blue sky.

name: Vintage Charm
description: Antique architecture and cobblestone streets creating a nostalgic and charming atmosphere.

name: Wildlife Encounter
description: Close encounter with wildlife in their natural habitat, showcasing the diversity of nature.
